generated_text:
- road: The paved surface with a textured pattern, extending into the distance, is clearly a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the left side of the road, bordered by trees and curbs, is designated for pedestrians and is a sidewalk.
- building: The structure on the left with a gray facade and windows is a building.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are visible along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible on the right side of the road and in the background.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign indicating a speed limit of 50 is visible on the right side of the road.
- car: A white car is parked on the left side of the road, and a black car is parked on the right side.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
